techs.name: Communication
techs.quote: 'Where tillage begins, other arts follow. The farmers therefore are the founders of human civilization.' - Daniel Webster

techs.name: Caves
techs.quote: 'Shall the clay say to him that fashioneth it, what makest thou?' - Bible Isaiah 45:9

techs.name: Stone Tools
techs.quote: 'The stone spear is a revolutionary invention. You can pierce the beast and inflict fatal injuries.'

techs.name: Stone Pillars
techs.quote: 'what is these stone pillars for? Maybe, these means cavemen's faith heritage.'

techs.name: Campments
techs.quote: 'It looks like we can settle down for a while in this rich area. but, it is not easy to stop living in caves for cavemen.'

techs.name: Bone Tools
techs.quote: 'Bones, antlers, horns, tusks, and teeth are plentiful leftovers. Why don't you use these for tools?'

techs.name: Burials
techs.quote: 'By interring and mourning their ancestors, Cavemen start to come to terms with their own morality.'

techs.name: Settlements
techs.quote: 'Cavemen continued to migration and became concentrated in cities.'

techs.name: Agriculture
techs.quote: 'Where tillage begins, other arts follow. The farmers therefore are the founders of human civilization.' - Daniel Webster

techs.name: Credits
techs.quote: 'Honor the creator, honor your tribe, and honor the one who lighted the spark to create this. In two words: Honor me.' -Bamboolord
